short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Intercept HTTP requests through rules written in JavaScript.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get the shift rule from the URL (or Data URL), the rule is written in JavaScript, and then apply the rules when the page makes an HTTP request.

User should enter a subscription rule URL, and then all rules are obtained via the rule URL.

See docs here: https://github.com/alchemy-works/url-shift/
